title: Ola launches Roadster electric motorcycles starting from Rs 74,999, teases two more
description: Ola Electric Roadster: Ola Electric introduced three new electric motorcycles in the Roadster series, starting at Rs 74,999. The company plans to integrate its battery cells into vehicles from Q1 FY26. Models launched include Roadster, Roadster X, and Roadster Pro. Two additional models, Sportster and Arrowhead, were teased, aiming to boost EV adoption in India's motorcycle market.
